page.title: 05A morning in Marnhull
page.content: It was 6.50 on a Friday morning.I put on my light and read my Secret Seven book till 7.00am.I got up,did my hair and went down stairs to have breakfast. I saw the paper in the door. I looked for Pop Panel-it was Nik Kershaw! I shouted to my sister, and she cut it out.It was about his song "The Riddle".My sister made up her porridge and I had my medicine and branflakes.We did our teeth and faces.My sister read the paper for a while and then went to get her bus. I settled down in a chair and read my great book.When my mother came home from work at 8.30-she's a nurse-she tested me on my spellings.I got my sewing,put it in my bag and went to school.
